name: Murder on the Disorient Express
description:
Murder on the Disorient Express is an interactive murder mystery text adventure created by Shayne Hayes and Jonah Oxenhandler in Twine 2.0. William James Magnus III has been murdered and it falls to you to solve the crime! Can you navigate the train and its interpersonal web of deceit to figure out whodunnit?

Not to be confused with "Disorient on the Murder Express," another murder mystery game on itch.io.
